item.title: Plex Server Migration
item.description: In this post, I describe how to migrate media from one Plex server to a new server installation. The official Plex documentation on how to do this leaves out several critical details that I’ll cover here. If you’ve somehow lost the server configuration options from your new install, I’ll show you how to fix that below. ![](https://jetvillegas.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/5/2021/06/no_server_options-1024x897.png)## Prepare the Source Server I’m moving from one Linux installation (Ubuntu 18.04.5 LTS) to another (Ubuntu 20.
